Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") UserInputService = game:GetService("UserInputService")
Animations = {}
Remotes = Tool:WaitForChild("Remotes") ServerControl = Remotes:WaitForChild("ServerControl") ClientControl = Remotes:WaitForChild("ClientControl")
ToolEquipped = false
function SetAnimation(mode, value) if not ToolEquipped or not CheckIfAlive() or not mode or not value then return end if mode == "PlayAnimation" then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() table.remove(Animations, i) end end local AnimationTrack = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(value.Animation) table.insert(Animations, {Animation = value.Animation, AnimationTrack = AnimationTrack}) AnimationTrack:Play(value.FadeTime, value.Weight, value.Speed) elseif mode == "StopAnimation" and value then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() table.remove(Animations, i) end end end end
function CheckIfAlive() return (((Character and Character.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0 and Torso and Torso.Parent and Player and Player.Parent) and true) or false) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") or Character:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso") Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) if not CheckIfAlive() then return end PlayerMouse = Mouse ToolEquipped = true end
function Unequipped() ToolEquipped = false for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v and v.AnimationTrack then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() end end Animations = {} end
function InvokeServer(mode, value) local ServerReturn pcall(function() ServerReturn = ServerControl:InvokeServer(mode, value) end) return ServerReturn end
function OnClientInvoke(mode, value) if not mode or not ToolEquipped or not CheckIfAlive() then return end if mode == "PlayAnimation" then SetAnimation("PlayAnimation", value) elseif mode == "StopAnimation" and value then SetAnimation("StopAnimation", value) elseif mode == "MouseData" then return ((PlayerMouse and {Position = PlayerMouse.Hit.p, Target = PlayerMouse.Target}) or nil) end end
ClientControl.OnClientInvoke = OnClientInvoke
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
Tool:GetPropertyChangedSignal("Enabled"):Connect(UpdateIcon) Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") Mesh = Handle:WaitForChild("Mesh")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local function Create_PrivImpl(objectType) if type(objectType) ~= 'string' then error("Argument of Create must be a string", 2) end --return the proxy function that gives us the nice Create'string'{data} syntax --The first function call is a function call using Lua's single-string-argument syntax --The second function call is using Lua's single-table-argument syntax --Both can be chained together for the nice effect. return function(dat) --default to nothing, to handle the no argument given case dat = dat or {}
--make the object to mutate local obj = Instance.new(objectType) local parent = nil
--stored constructor function to be called after other initialization local ctor = nil
for k, v in pairs(dat) do --add property if type(k) == 'string' then if k == 'Parent' then -- Parent should always be set last, setting the Parent of a new object -- immediately makes performance worse for all subsequent property updates. parent = v else obj[k] = v end
--add child elseif type(k) == 'number' then if type(v) ~= 'userdata' then error("Bad entry in Create body: Numeric keys must be paired with children, got a: "..type(v), 2) end v.Parent = obj
--event connect elseif type(k) == 'table' and k.__eventname then if type(v) ~= 'function' then error("Bad entry in Create body: Key `[Create.E\'"..k.__eventname.."\']` must have a function value\ got: "..tostring(v), 2) end obj[k.__eventname]:connect(v)
--define constructor function elseif k == t.Create then if type(v) ~= 'function' then error("Bad entry in Create body: Key `[Create]` should be paired with a constructor function, \ got: "..tostring(v), 2) elseif ctor then --ctor already exists, only one allowed error("Bad entry in Create body: Only one constructor function is allowed", 2) end ctor = v
else error("Bad entry ("..tostring(k).." => "..tostring(v)..") in Create body", 2) end end
--apply constructor function if it exists if ctor then ctor(obj) end
if parent then obj.Parent = parent end
--return the completed object return obj end end
--now, create the functor: Create = setmetatable({}, {__call = function(tb, ...) return Create_PrivImpl(...) end})
--and create the "Event.E" syntax stub. Really it's just a stub to construct a table which our Create --function can recognize as special. Create.E = function(eventName) return {__eventname = eventName} end
BaseUrl = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id="
AppleScript = script:WaitForChild("AppleScript") DiplomaScript = script:WaitForChild("DiplomaScript") BookScript = script:WaitForChild("BookScript")
Sounds = { Fire = Handle:WaitForChild("Fire"), }
BasePart = Create("Part"){ Material = Enum.Material.Plastic, Shape = Enum.PartType.Block, TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom, Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2), Locked = true, CanCollide = true, Anchored = false, }
Apple = BasePart:Clone() Apple.Name = "Apple" Apple.Shape = Enum.PartType.Ball Apple.Size = Vector3.new(0.7, 0.7, 0.7) Apple.Friction = 2 Apple.Elasticity = 1 Create("SpecialMesh"){ Name = "Mesh", MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh, MeshId = (BaseUrl .. "420224659"), TextureId = (BaseUrl .. "420224524"), Scale = Vector3.new(1.25, 1.25, 1.25), VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1), Offset = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0), Parent = Apple, }
Book = BasePart:Clone() Book.Name = "Book" Book.Size = Vector3.new(0.7, 0.3, 0.7) Create("SpecialMesh"){ Name = "Mesh", MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh, MeshId = (BaseUrl .. "420224708"), TextureId = (BaseUrl .. "420224576"), Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1), VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1), Offset = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0), Parent = Book, }
Diploma = BasePart:Clone() Diploma.Name = "Diploma" Diploma.Size = Vector3.new(0.5, 0.375, 1.5) Create("SpecialMesh"){ Name = "Mesh", MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh, MeshId = (BaseUrl .. "420224757"), TextureId = (BaseUrl .. "420224608"), Scale = Vector3.new(0.5, 0.5, 0.5), VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1), Offset = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0), Parent = Diploma, }
Gravity = workspace.Gravity
ReloadTime = 3
ProjectileReady = true ToolEquipped = false
Remotes = Tool:WaitForChild("Remotes") ServerControl = (Remotes:FindFirstChild("ServerControl") or Create("RemoteFunction"){ Name = "ServerControl", Parent = Remotes, }) ClientControl = (Remotes:FindFirstChild("ClientControl") or Create("RemoteFunction"){ Name = "ClientControl", Parent = Remotes, })
Handle.Transparency = 0 Tool.Enabled = true
function CheckIfAlive() return (((Character and Character.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0 and Player and Player.Parent) and true) or false) end
function Activated()
local MouseData = InvokeClient("MouseData") if not MouseData or not MouseData.Position or not Tool.Enabled or not CheckIfAlive() or not ToolEquipped then return end Tool.Enabled = false
Sounds.Fire.Pitch = (math.random(700, 850) * 0.001) Sounds.Fire:Play()
local Projectiles = { {Object = Apple, Script = AppleScript}, {Object = Book, Script = BookScript}, {Object = Diploma, Script = DiplomaScript}, }
local ProjectileSelected = Projectiles[math.random(1, #Projectiles)] local Projectile = ProjectileSelected.Object:Clone() Projectile.CFrame = (Projectile.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(math.rad(math.random(-360, 360)), math.rad(math.random(-360, 360)), math.rad(math.random(-360, 360))))
pcall(function() local SpawnPos = (Handle.CFrame * CFrame.new(0, 1, -((Handle.Size.Z / 2) + 0.5))) Projectile.CFrame = (SpawnPos * CFrame.Angles(Projectile.CFrame:toEulerAnglesXYZ())) SpawnPos = SpawnPos.p local TargetPos = MouseData.Position
local Direction = (TargetPos - SpawnPos) --Direction = (Direction - Direction.Unit * 5)
local DeltaXZSquared = ((Direction.X ^ 2) + (Direction.Z ^ 2)) local DeltaXZ = math.sqrt(DeltaXZSquared) local DeltaY = Direction.Y local Alpha = (math.random() * math.pi / 4 + math.pi / 8) local Numerator = (-0.5 * Gravity * DeltaXZSquared) local Denominator = (math.cos(Alpha) * math.cos(Alpha) * (DeltaY - math.tan(Alpha) * DeltaXZ)) if Denominator == 0 then return end local MaxSpeed = 120 local MissileSpeed = math.sqrt(Numerator / Denominator) if MissileSpeed > MaxSpeed or tostring(MissileSpeed) == tostring(0 / 0) or tostring(MissileSpeed) == tostring(math.huge) then MissileSpeed = MaxSpeed end
local VectorXZ = (MissileSpeed * math.cos(Alpha)) local VectorY = (MissileSpeed * math.sin(Alpha)) local VectorX = (VectorXZ * Direction.X / DeltaXZ) local VectorZ = (VectorXZ * Direction.Z / DeltaXZ)
local Velocity = Vector3.new(VectorX, VectorY, VectorZ)
Projectile.Velocity = Velocity
local Values = { {Name = "Creator", Class = "ObjectValue", Value = Player}, }
for i, v in pairs(Values) do local Value = Create(v.Class){ Name = v.Name, Value = v.Value, Parent = Projectile, } end
local ProjectileScript = ProjectileSelected.Script:Clone() ProjectileScript.Disabled = false ProjectileScript.Parent = Projectile
Debris:AddItem(Projectile, 15) Projectile.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") end) wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Enabled = true end
function Equipped() Character = Tool.Parent Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) if not CheckIfAlive() then return end ToolEquipped = true end
function Unequipped() ToolEquipped = false end
function InvokeClient(Mode, Value) local ClientReturn = nil pcall(function() ClientReturn = ClientControl:InvokeClient(Player, Mode, Value) end) return ClientReturn end
function OnServerInvoke(player, mode, value) if player ~= Player or not ToolEquipped or not CheckIfAlive() then return end end
ServerControl.OnServerInvoke = OnServerInvoke
workspace:GetPropertyChangedSignal("Gravity"):Connect(function() Gravity = workspace.Gravity end)
Tool.Activated:connect(Activated) Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Part = script.Parent
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
RbxUtility = LoadLibrary("RbxUtility") Create = RbxUtility.Create
BaseUrl = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id="
EffectScript = script:WaitForChild("EffectScript")
Creator = Part:FindFirstChild("Creator")
AlreadyHit = false
function GetCreator() return (((Creator and Creator.Value and Creator.Value:IsA("Player") and Creator.Value.Parent) and Creator.Value) or nil) end
Part.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if not Hit or not Hit.Parent or AlreadyHit then return end --[[local CreatorPlayer = GetCreator() if not CreatorPlayer then return end]] local Character = Hit.Parent local Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 then return end if Character:FindFirstChild("EffectScript") then return end
local Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) --Only works on players, no NPCs. if not Player then return end
AlreadyHit = true
local EatScriptCopy = EffectScript:Clone() EatScriptCopy.Name = "EffectScript" local EffectPart = Part:Clone() EffectPart.CanCollide = false for i, v in pairs(EffectPart:GetChildren()) do if string.find(string.lower(v.ClassName), string.lower("Script")) then v:Destroy() end end local Effect = Create("ObjectValue"){ Name = "Effect", Value = EffectPart:Clone(), Parent = EatScriptCopy, } EatScriptCopy.Disabled = false EatScriptCopy.Parent = Character
Part:Destroy()
end)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Character = script.Parent
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
RbxUtility = LoadLibrary("RbxUtility") Create = RbxUtility.Create
BaseUrl = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id="
Effect = script:FindFirstChild("Effect") EatAnimation = script:FindFirstChild("EatAnimation") EatSound = script:FindFirstChild("EatSound")
function PickUpAndEat(Character) if not Character then return end local Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") local RightArm = Character:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 or not Torso or not RightArm then return end local EffectObject = Effect:Clone() local Weld = Create("Weld"){ Name = "Weld", Part0 = RightArm, Part1 = EffectObject, C0 = CFrame.new(0, -1, 0, 1, 0, -0, 0, 0, 1, 0, -1, -0), C1 = CFrame.new(-0.0500000007, -0.200000003, 0.100000001, 0.897661805, 0, -0.440685183, -0.291757196, 0.749456644, -0.594300032, 0.330274463, 0.662053466, 0.67275852), --Effect grip offset Parent = EffectObject, } local Tools = {} local Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) if Player then for i, v in pairs(Character:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("Tool") then table.insert(Tools, v) end end Humanoid:UnequipTools() end Debris:AddItem(EffectObject, 5) EffectObject.Parent = Character local AnimationTrack = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(EatAnimation) AnimationTrack:Play() wait(1.5) local Sound = EatSound:Clone() Sound.Parent = EffectObject Sound:Play() Humanoid.Health = (Humanoid.Health + 15) wait(1.5) if EffectObject and EffectObject.Parent then EffectObject:Destroy() end for i, v in pairs(Tools) do if v and v.Parent then Humanoid:EquipTool(v) end end end
function DestroyScript() Debris:AddItem(script, 1) end
if not Effect or not Effect.Value or not EatAnimation or not EatSound then DestroyScript() return end
Effect = Effect.Value:Clone()
PickUpAndEat(Character)
DestroyScript()

--Made by Luckymaxer
Part = script.Parent
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
RbxUtility = LoadLibrary("RbxUtility") Create = RbxUtility.Create
BaseUrl = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id="
EffectScript = script:WaitForChild("EffectScript")
Creator = Part:FindFirstChild("Creator")
AlreadyHit = false
function GetCreator() return (((Creator and Creator.Value and Creator.Value:IsA("Player") and Creator.Value.Parent) and Creator.Value) or nil) end
Part.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if not Hit or not Hit.Parent or AlreadyHit then return end --[[local CreatorPlayer = GetCreator() if not CreatorPlayer then return end]] local Character = Hit.Parent local Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 then return end if Character:FindFirstChild("EffectScript") then return end
local Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) --Only works on players, no NPCs. if not Player then return end
AlreadyHit = true
local EatScriptCopy = EffectScript:Clone() EatScriptCopy.Name = "EffectScript" local EffectPart = Part:Clone() EffectPart.CanCollide = false for i, v in pairs(EffectPart:GetChildren()) do if string.find(string.lower(v.ClassName), string.lower("Script")) then v:Destroy() end end local Effect = Create("ObjectValue"){ Name = "Effect", Value = EffectPart:Clone(), Parent = EatScriptCopy, } EatScriptCopy.Disabled = false EatScriptCopy.Parent = Character
Part:Destroy()
end)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Character = script.Parent
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris") InsertService = game:GetService("InsertService")
RbxUtility = LoadLibrary("RbxUtility") Create = RbxUtility.Create
BaseUrl = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id="
Effect = script:FindFirstChild("Effect") LookAtAnimation = script:FindFirstChild("LookAt") PoofSound = script:FindFirstChild("Poof")
Glasses = {11884330, 221255437, 301820724, 301820310, 125369932, 116778553}
OriginalHats = {}
function InsertAsset(AssetId) local AssetModel = InsertService:LoadAsset(AssetId) local Asset = AssetModel:GetChildren()[1]:Clone() Debris:AddItem(AssetModel, 1) return Asset end
function PickUpAndRead(Character) if not Character then return end local Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") local RightArm = Character:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 or not Torso or not RightArm then return end local EffectObject = Effect:Clone() local Weld = Create("Weld"){ Name = "Weld", Part0 = RightArm, Part1 = EffectObject, C0 = CFrame.new(0, -1, 0, 1, 0, -0, 0, 0, 1, 0, -1, -0), C1 = CFrame.new(-0.300000012, -0.200000003, 0, 0, 0, -1, -1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0), --Effect grip offset Parent = EffectObject, } local Tools = {} local Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) if Player then for i, v in pairs(Character:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("Tool") then table.insert(Tools, v) end end Humanoid:UnequipTools() end Debris:AddItem(EffectObject, 5) EffectObject.Parent = Character local AnimationTrack = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(LookAtAnimation) AnimationTrack:Play(0.25, nil, 0.25) wait(1.5) local Sound = PoofSound:Clone() Sound.Parent = EffectObject Sound:Play() if EffectObject and EffectObject.Parent then EffectObject:Destroy() end for i, v in pairs(Tools) do if v and v.Parent then Humanoid:EquipTool(v) end end --[[for i, v in pairs(Character:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("Hat") then table.insert(OriginalHats, v) v.Parent = nil end end]] local NewHats = {} local HatsSelected = {Glasses[math.random(1, #Glasses)]} for i, v in pairs(HatsSelected) do local NewHat = InsertAsset(v):Clone() table.insert(NewHats, NewHat) NewHat.Parent = Character end wait(10) for i, v in pairs(NewHats) do if v and v.Parent then v:Destroy() end end for i, v in pairs(OriginalHats) do v.Parent = Character end OriginalHats = {} end
function DestroyScript() Debris:AddItem(script, 1) end
if not Effect or not Effect.Value or not LookAtAnimation or not PoofSound then DestroyScript() return end
Effect = Effect.Value:Clone()
PickUpAndRead(Character)
DestroyScript()

Part = script.Parent
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
RbxUtility = LoadLibrary("RbxUtility") Create = RbxUtility.Create
BaseUrl = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id="
EffectScript = script:WaitForChild("EffectScript")
Creator = Part:FindFirstChild("Creator")
AlreadyHit = false
function GetCreator() return (((Creator and Creator.Value and Creator.Value:IsA("Player") and Creator.Value.Parent) and Creator.Value) or nil) end
Part.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if not Hit or not Hit.Parent or AlreadyHit then return end --[[local CreatorPlayer = GetCreator() if not CreatorPlayer then return end]] local Character = Hit.Parent local Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 then return end if Character:FindFirstChild("EffectScript") then return end
local Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) --Only works on players, no NPCs. if not Player then return end
AlreadyHit = true
local EatScriptCopy = EffectScript:Clone() EatScriptCopy.Name = "EffectScript" local EffectPart = Part:Clone() EffectPart.CanCollide = false for i, v in pairs(EffectPart:GetChildren()) do if string.find(string.lower(v.ClassName), string.lower("Script")) then v:Destroy() end end local Effect = Create("ObjectValue"){ Name = "Effect", Value = EffectPart:Clone(), Parent = EatScriptCopy, } EatScriptCopy.Disabled = false EatScriptCopy.Parent = Character
Part:Destroy()
end)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Character = script.Parent
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris") InsertService = game:GetService("InsertService")
RbxUtility = LoadLibrary("RbxUtility") Create = RbxUtility.Create
BaseUrl = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id="
Effect = script:FindFirstChild("Effect") HoldUpAnimation = script:FindFirstChild("HoldUp") TossHatAnimation = script:FindFirstChild("TossHat") ApplauseClapSound = script:FindFirstChild("ApplauseClap") ParticlesBin = script:FindFirstChild("ParticlesBin")
GradCaps = {161265831, 161210868, 28672647, 11721340, 53915490, 255792526, 115991937}
OriginalHats = {}
function InsertAsset(AssetId) local AssetModel = InsertService:LoadAsset(AssetId) local Asset = AssetModel:GetChildren()[1]:Clone() Debris:AddItem(AssetModel, 1) return Asset end
function PickUpAndGraduate(Character) if not Character then return end local Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local Head = Character:FindFirstChild("Head") local RightArm = Character:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 or not Head or not RightArm then return end local OriginalHats = {} for i, v in pairs(Character:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("Hat") then table.insert(OriginalHats, v) v.Parent = nil end end local GradCap = InsertAsset(GradCaps[math.random(1, #GradCaps)]):Clone() local Handle = GradCap:FindFirstChild("Handle") local HeadWeld if Handle then Handle.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) Handle.CanCollide = false Handle.Name = GradCap.Name HeadWeld = Create("Weld"){ Name = "Weld", Part0 = Head, Part1 = Handle, Parent = Handle, C0 = CFrame.new(0, 0.5, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1), C1 = GradCap.AttachmentPoint, } Debris:AddItem(Handle, 10) Handle.Parent = Character end local EffectObject = Effect:Clone() local Weld = Create("Weld"){ Name = "Weld", Part0 = RightArm, Part1 = EffectObject, C0 = CFrame.new(0, -1, 0, 1, 0, -0, 0, 0, 1, 0, -1, -0), C1 = CFrame.new(0.125, 0, -1, -0.188600376, -0.446652591, 0.87460357, -0.148713231, 0.893305182, 0.424134701, -0.970728755, -1, -0.234900832), --Effect grip offset Parent = EffectObject, } local Tools = {} local Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) if Player then for i, v in pairs(Character:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("Tool") then table.insert(Tools, v) end end Humanoid:UnequipTools() end Debris:AddItem(EffectObject, 5) EffectObject.Parent = Character local AnimationTrack = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(HoldUpAnimation) AnimationTrack:Play(0.25, nil, 0.25) wait(1.5) AnimationTrack:AdjustSpeed(0) local Particles = {} for i, v in pairs(ParticlesBin:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ParticleEmitter") then table.insert(Particles, v) end end local ParticlesReady = {} for i = 1, math.random(6, 18) do local Particle = Particles[math.random(1, #Particles)]:Clone() local Color = (Vector3.new(math.random(), math.random(), math.random()) * 1) Color = Color3.new(Color.X, Color.Y, Color.Z) local ColorSeq = ColorSequence.new(Color, Color) Particle.Color = ColorSeq Particle.Transparency = NumberSequence.new(math.random() * 0.25) Particle.Rate = 0 Particle.Lifetime = NumberRange.new(1.5, (math.random(1500, 3500) * 0.001)) Particle.Speed = NumberRange.new(math.random(4500, 7500) * 0.001) Particle.Acceleration = Vector3.new(0, (math.abs(math.random(7500, 12000) * 0.001) * -1), 0) Particle.Enabled = false Debris:AddItem(Particle, 8) table.insert(ParticlesReady, Particle) Particle.Parent = Head end wait(0.1) --so emit works... for i, v in pairs(ParticlesReady) do v:Emit(math.random(6, 18)) end local Sound = ApplauseClapSound:Clone() Sound.Parent = EffectObject Sound:Play() wait(1.5) AnimationTrack:AdjustSpeed(0.25) wait(0.5) Weld.C1 = CFrame.new(0, 0, -0.600000024, -0.829455853, -0.558572292, 0, -0.558572233, 0.829455972, 0, -0, 0, -1) wait(1) if EffectObject and EffectObject.Parent then EffectObject:Destroy() end local LeftArm = Character:FindFirstChild("Left Arm") if LeftArm and Handle and Handle.Parent then local AnimationTrack = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(TossHatAnimation) AnimationTrack:Play(0.5, nil, 0.25) wait(0.75) --[[local Weld = Create("Weld"){ Name = "Weld", Part0 = LeftArm, Part1 = Handle, C0 = LeftArm.CFrame:inverse(), C1 = Handle.CFrame:inverse(), Parent = Handle, }]] Debris:AddItem(Handle, 3) Handle.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") local ThrowDirection = CFrame.new(Handle.Position, LeftArm.Position).lookVector ThrowDirection = (ThrowDirection * Vector3.new(1, 0, 1)) if HeadWeld and HeadWeld.Parent then HeadWeld:Destroy() end Handle.Velocity = ((ThrowDirection * math.random(15, 40)) + Vector3.new(0, math.random(75, 125), 0)) Handle.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(math.random(), math.random(), math.random()) wait(0.5) else if Handle and Handle.Parent then Handle:Destroy() end end wait(1.5) for i, v in pairs(OriginalHats) do v.Parent = Character end for i, v in pairs(Tools) do if v and v.Parent then Humanoid:EquipTool(v) end end end
function DestroyScript() Debris:AddItem(script, 1) end
if not Effect or not Effect.Value or not HoldUpAnimation or not TossHatAnimation or not ApplauseClapSound or not ParticlesBin then DestroyScript() return end
Effect = Effect.Value:Clone()
PickUpAndGraduate(Character)
DestroyScript()
